title: Looking for the Folder to All the Splash Arts

embed.description: Does anyone know where the folder is?

body:
Hello Rioter,

As the title implies, I'm looking for the splash art for all the skins and champions. I'm planning to use for a slide show for my background and lock screen (I use Windows 10 as my OS). I did some searching around and was out of luck.  The suggested pathway that is linked above doesn't work anymore because lol_air_client is gone. I tried to look explore but I got loss quickly. 

This doesn't work anymore: 
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.251\deploy\assets\images\champions

Can I get the pathway to all the folders? 

Thanks, 
Xander MacDaddy

replies.body:
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.238\deploy\assets\images\champions

Found it there, sooo maybe they changed it or something?

I wasn't able to get that folder for you, but I was able to find this [**reddit post**](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/32l1bb/all_124_champion_splash_arts_in_one_imgur_album/) with links to all of the splash art for champions as well as their skins!
